attributes.action: No to further Council Tax increases in 2017.
attributes.background: With an inflation busting 3.9% increase last year, many Councils propose another 4% this year which cannot be justified.  The tax is already too expensive, this Government and Councils must get their finances in order, MP's should take a pay cut along with over paid Council executives.

rejection.details: Local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament, set the rates of council tax in their local area.
